attributes.action: Debate the use of Cannabis Oil for medical purposes.
attributes.background: Debate the decision taken by the Home Secretary not to issue a licence for the controlled use of Cannabis Oil to help regulate epileptic episodes in a child, one of 9 in the world to suffer from a rare form of the condition.

rejection.details:
The House of Commons debated medical cannabis and the case of Alfie Dingley on 20 February. You can read the debate here:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2018-02-20/debates/5C18DA05-4AF4-408A-A7C2-67F3E84133CC/MedicalCannabis
